snippet: The spread of the video comes at an awkward time for Chile, traditionally among Latin America’s largest arms importers, as the country faces territorial disputes with Bolivia and Peru.
abstract: Chilean military is put on defensive after video shared widely on social networks shows Chilean sailors chanting that they will kill Argentinians, Bolivians and Peruvians.
lead_paragraph: The spread of the video comes at an awkward time for Chile, traditionally among Latin America’s largest arms importers, as the country faces territorial disputes with Bolivia and Peru.

headline.main: In Chile, Video Appears to Show Sailors Vowing to Kill Foreigners
headline.print_headline: Chile: Video Appears to Show Sailors Vowing to Kill Foreigners
